title: bhAgavatOttamar
sahitya:
bhAgavatOttamar padam paNi manamE paraman aDiyArkku aDimaiyAi nALum


anupallavi

  Agama purANam anaittum pOTrum accutan uraiyum Ananda hrdaya


caraNam    niddirai viDuttu citta shuddhiyuDan attanai ninaindu bhakti sheidu nALum
 mukti perum vazhi muzhudum kaip-piDittu iddaraNi vAzhum satva guNa bOdha
